Articles.Content: I was just switching kerbals around crafts when I noticed when I tried to turn SAS on it wouldn't turn on. I definitely had a levelled up pilot on it and a probe core with SAS capabilities but It just wouldn't turn on. I did some experiments and I found out that it has affected all crafts new and old on the save, but any other save file works fine. If anyone knows how to fix this I would relay appreciate this because I relay don't want to make a new save

Well, nobody will know anything unless you can provide us with the save file in question.   Also, if you can play that save, try to turn on SAS, and then upload the output.log (found in kspDATA folder) someone would have a much easier time helping you out.
